text: Spencer James Smith (born September 2, 1987 in Summerlin, Nevada) was previously the drummer for the rock band Panic at the Disco. Spencer was one of the original members of the band. He was also the youngest member of the band after the departure of Brent Wilson. He founded the band along with Ryan Ross, who he grew up with. Smith left the band in 2013. == Other websites == * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American drummers Category:Panic! at the Disco members Category:Musicians from Nevada Category:American rock musicians
title: Spencer Smith
